Articles.Content: I have a Saitek AV8R, which is pretty basic i know, but i cant change any of the inputs on the control mapping screen, can somebody give me some tips? Im using KSP 0.12.0 and Windows 7.

I assume you\'ve checked that the joystick shows up in Windows\' game devices, and the axes and butons respond properly.

Do you have KSP unzipped in Program Files or its equivalent? We\'re seeing that cause other permissions issues on 7, though I would expect the symptom to be that your changes don\'t 'stick'.

Yup I\'ve checked that all of the inputs work in the game devices menu. Also no I don\'t have KSP in program files. After more attempts, I seem to be able to set the inputs to any of the buttons, i.e the 'trigger' can be set to throttle up, however the actual throttle toggle can not be set to throttle up/down.

It is quite weird...

Ah. Sorry, it\'s text, I have to ask - you have in fact scrolled down to the axes section, right? Those throttles are axes, you\'d want to assign one of them to the throttle axis. It\'s impossible in general to assign axes to button inputs in modern games.

That would be what i need to do....lol thanks

i guess thats what this subforum is for huh?
